serviceDetails: A root canal is performed when the soft inner part of a tooth, known as the pulp, is injured or becomes inflamed or infected.

A dental filling is performed to restore the size, shape, color shade and overall oral health of a tooth that is damaged by tooth decay

Braces work by putting pressure on your teeth over a period of time to slowly move them in a specific direction. The bone under them changes shape, too.
